BubbleTab.citation: My name is Thomas, pleased to meet you üòâ.

textHome:
Hello ! 

My name is Thomas Birmingham and I am a developer. 

Currently looking for a position, I am available in Ile de France or for full remote work. 

Feel free to share with me any of your upcoming projects !

experience.title: JUNIOR FRONT-END DEVELOPER FRONT-END INTEGRATION AND DESIGN R&D
responsibilities: Designing solutions in JAVASCRIPT/JQUERY and REACT JS
R&D: with AR.JS (augmented reality in Webapp)
experience.description: At the beginning of my contract within the company, I was involved in classic html css integration, then in     designing solutions in javascript/ jquery and React Js (technology on which I evolve on a daily basis). Then, I conducted R&D to expand our sales catalog, notably on technologies like machine learning with Tensorflow which allowed me to do object recognition (classification), or with AR.js a library that allows augmented reality rendering in Webapp.

experience.title: JUNIOR FRONT-END DEVELOPER
responsibilities: Creation of a calculation tool to enable an online quote
Deepening of skills in JOOMLA, YOOTHEME, JOOMLA ULKIT library, HTML 5, CSS 3, JAVASCRIPT, JQUERY, PHOTOSHOP, SHOTCUT

heroText.textH3: Contact me for all your projects
heroText.textP3: AN INNOVATIVE WEB PRODUCT THAT SUITS YOU

product.title: QUALITATIVE
product.text: Take your business to the next level with an optimized, fast and responsive state-of-the-art web project

product.title: OBJECTIVE
product.text: Imagine, design and program web projects by proposing technical and automated solutions.

product.title: HYBRID REMOTE
product.text: Organized remotely, we communicate, we program objectives, we use agile methods.
